name: Giggly's Park
description:
"Parent's wont be present during the playtime"

Giggly's Park is a Procedural-Building Horror game developed by DS inspired in childhood parks that we all loved back then and games like Eternal Walk and Voxel building games...

Complex, scary and fun, are the three words to describe this weird unique experience, survive as a young kid with all kind of creative tools and toys in a dangerous little world where death awaits on every dusty corner..

We have been invited to the greatest park of all the country! Giggly's Park, which is located in your city and apparently looks
decent in the TV announcement, to celebrate your birthday!

One time we have entered, a fantastic fair celebration is done just for you,candies,cupcakes, snacks and arcade machines to play!
But the best thing is a giant maze alike park surrounded for ball pools and tons of slides!

The game is under current BETA and it is planned for future updates, so stay tuned
